resources.title: JoJo Stat Roller
resources.desc: Easily roll and calculate character and Stand stats. Created by Kyler Froman.

resources.desc: 5e-style character sheets for JoJo D&D. Created by Tyler Schowalter.

resources.title: Feature Yours Here!
resources.desc: Want your work featured here? Reach out to Kyler (Xenotater) through our Community Discord.
